definition: to kidnap/to hijack/to abduct/to hold under duress
to rob/to plunder/to seize by force/to coerce/calamity/abbr. for kalpa 劫波[jie2 bo1]
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

sentences.english: The robber abduct the heiress and hold her to ransom.
sentences.chinese: 強盜劫持了女繼承人並向她索取贖金。
兩個人劫持了那架飛機。

sentences.english: After the tanker was hijacked lost contact with the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 油輪遭劫持後與外界失去聯繫。

sentences.english: The plane was hijacked soon after it took off.
sentences.chinese: 該機起飛不久便遭劫持。

sentences.english: It turns out that the driver is a fugitive, who hijacks the family's car.
sentences.chinese: 兇徒劫持了這家人，驅車駛入深山之中。

sentences.english: The militants' attempt to hijack the plane was foiled by the flight crew, the official said.
sentences.chinese: 此官員說飛機乘務組挫敗了劫持此飛機的企圖。

sentences.english: Local officials say the abductors had links to al-Qaeda.
sentences.chinese: 當地官員表示，劫持者與基地組織有聯繫。

sentences.english: A good example of this is the clickjacking exploit.
sentences.chinese: 一個好的例子是點擊劫持漏洞利用。

sentences.english: People would be framed for bombings they did not commit; planes would be hijacked.
sentences.chinese: 人們將爆炸事件嫁禍於他們沒有犯，飛機將被劫持。

sentences.english: It was unclear what his relation to the hostage-taker was.
sentences.chinese: 目前還不清楚他和劫持人質者有什麼關係。

sentences.english: S. Korea fears ship hijacked by Somali pirates.
sentences.chinese: 韓國船隻恐被索馬里海盜劫持。

sentences.english: So he went on hostaging a bus full of foreign individuals.
sentences.chinese: 所以他劫持了一輛載滿外國遊客的旅行大巴。

sentences.english: The passengers of that highjacked airplane were rescued.
sentences.chinese: 那架被劫持的飛機上面的乘客都已獲救。

sentences.english: We advised the hijackers to surrender themselves to the police.
sentences.chinese: 我們勸那些劫持者向警察投案。

sentences.english: Afterward, Sun kidnaps Qin in the Gaojiazhuang village opposite earth trench.
sentences.chinese: 之後，孫某把秦某劫持到高家莊村對面一土壕裏。

sentences.english: The plane was hijacked while on a flight to Delhi.
sentences.chinese: 那架飛機在飛往德里途中遭劫持。

definition: to assassinate/(military) to fight with a bayonet/(baseball) to put out (a baserunner)
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
